summary: this make spell tomes be more costy
descriptionHtml:
hi its mikaelarp wit hyet another mod this time one thatl make all spelltomes both thoose you buy and sell be more costy there is no set value or percentage with wich theyve increased i just them to values i thought was fair enjoy ;D

plz write in the comments if u would like some sort of set value or u would like some other prices
if youd like i can also make a cheat version thatl make them free

oh and If u liked this mod then try looking at some of my other mods :D
and endorsements is very much apreciated
